data.title: Pear Perfection Hot Film Wax Pellets
data.meta_description: Product code: HOB1010Size: 500g The 24K Collection is waxing in its purest form! DescriptionPrickly Pear for smooth results! Designed to provide professionals with a high end, fast acting hot film wax for general use. The formulation harnesses the natural benefits of Prickly Pear (Barbary Fig) Seed Oil renowned for its powerful antioxidant compounds and its ability to calm irritation and redness of the skin. Suitable for all skin and hair types, the formulation's effective hair removal properties excel when used on larger treatment areas. Add some Pear Perfection to your waxing treatments. The 24K Collection Inspired by the incredible natural benefits it offers, Pure White Beeswax has been fundamental in the design and creation of this elite waxing collection. The addition of a bespoke selection of active ingredients ensures the 24K Collection provides premium levels of function and performance. Features 	No wax strips required 	Easily decant the amount of wax required per treatment 	Re-sealable bag 	Cruelty & Paraben Free 	Contains Barbary Fig (Prickly Pear) Seed Oil & Pure White Beeswax 	Suitable for all hair types and all treatment areas
data.text:
Product code: HOB1010

Size: 500g

The 24K Collection is waxing in its purest form!

Description

Prickly Pear for smooth results!

Designed to provide professionals with a high end, fast acting hot film wax for general use.

The formulation harnesses the natural benefits of Prickly Pear (Barbary Fig) Seed Oil renowned for its powerful antioxidant compounds and its ability to calm irritation and redness of the skin. Suitable for all skin and hair types, the formulation's effective hair removal properties excel when used on larger treatment areas.

Add some Pear Perfection to your waxing treatments.

The 24K Collection

Inspired by the incredible natural benefits it offers, Pure White Beeswax has been fundamental in the design and creation of this elite waxing collection. The addition of a bespoke selection of active ingredients ensures the 24K Collection provides premium levels of function and performance.

Features
